summary: Greg and Nelson are two complete opposites on a mission to complete their Home Teaching on the last day of the month--even if it kills them.
cast: Danny Allen|Jim Bennett|Jeff Birk|Michael Birkeland|Emerson Brian|Jimmy Chunga|Richard J. Clifford|Alex Darrow|Stephanie Darrow|Paul Eagleston|Deborah Ellis|Merrily Evans|Anna K. Findlay|Michael Flynn|Ruth Hale|Sally Hale|Jentri Harding|Melanie Harding|Jil Hunter|Nan Hunter|Cort Johnson|Wally Joyner|Chad Long|Gary Ludlow|John E. Moyer|Tayva Patch|Peter Pilling|Ryan Radebaugh|Fay Richins|Frank Richins|Elizabeth Sands|Dave Sullivan|Daryn Tufts|Shannon Tuttle|Annette Wright|Mark Hales
title: The Home Teachers
